codes.RT01: Type is a request to release the pending transactions.
codes.RT02: Type is a request to hold normal transactions.
codes.RT03: Type is a request to cancel a transaction.
codes.RT04: Type is a request to change the sequence of the transactions.
codes.RT05: Type is a request to release the suspicious transactions.

description: Specifies the external request type code for a payment control command in the format of character string with a maximum length of 4 characters.
name: ExternalPaymentControlRequestType1Code
